about_the_game:
About The Game

SCP: V/H/S immerses players in a chilling, narrative-driven horror experience inspired by the SCP Foundation. Explore haunting locations and unravel sinister stories captured on eerie VHS tapes. Each tape reveals a new tale of terror, blending atmospheric exploration, tense stealth mechanics, and nail-biting encounters with new and iconic SCP entities.

The First Of Many

In the first tape, "Gifts," you step into the shoes of Jack as a family Christmas turns into a nightmare. Navigate his snowbound home, uncover unsettling clues, and evade SCP-4666, the Yule Man. Can you survive the night and piece together the horrifying truth?

Key Features

  • Found Footage Immersion: Experience the terror through the lens of old VHS tapes, with grainy visuals and immersive sound design.

  • Iconic SCP Lore: Encounter terrifying creatures from the SCP universe, including SCP-4666, the Yule Man.

  • Narrative-Driven Gameplay: Dive into gripping, standalone stories that combine exploration, puzzle-solving, and stealth, with each tape putting the spotlight on one specific SCP.

  • Tense Atmosphere: Navigate dark, suspenseful environments where every shadow and sound could mean danger.

  • Multiple Perspectives: Play through different character's harrowing experiences, each uniquely tied to a specific SCP.

content_descriptors.notes: SCP: V/H/S contains intense themes and depictions of psychological and physical horror that may not be suitable for all audiences. This includes: Graphic Violence, Themes of Abduction, Disturbing Imagery and Sound Effects, and Situations of helplessness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i3-8100 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030 2GB or RX 550 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5-10600 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 2070 8GB or Radeon RX 6600XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Step into chilling found-footage horror with SCP: V/H/S. Explore sinister tapes tied to the SCP universe, uncover haunting tales, and survive encounters with iconic SCPs like SCP-4666. Atmospheric, narrative-driven, and steeped in dread—will you survive the nightmare?
